name: Atlantis (itch) (Raynilar)
description:
Roam the underwater maze, plunge deeper and deeper. Look for magic spheres, mix colors and open doors to go further.

Can you get to the very bottom of the labyrinthine structure?

Each next playthrough will be different from the previous one and will bring you a new experience: the maze is generated randomly.

• move — wasd / arrow keys 

• change left color — left mouse button

• change right color — right mouse button

• use the left color — hold LMB

• use the right color — hold RMB

• quit game — esc

...and bugs

• Known bug! If you can't switch the color in one hand, switch it in the other. We apologize for this.

• There is a small chance that at the beginning of the maze you will find yourself in a place from which you cannot get out. We've only seen this once, but we think we need to warn you. Press the button and try again.

• If instead of the taken color you have in your hand red, please change the color one time.
